Class TableMapping.Relation

Represents the mapping of a relationship from the principal entity to a dependent entity type.

Constructors

| Edit this page View Source

Relation(PropertyInfo, Type, Column, Column, bool)

Represents the mapping of a relationship from the principal entity to a dependent entity type.

Declaration
public Relation(PropertyInfo NavProp, Type DependentType, Column PrincipalKey, Column ForeignKey, bool CascadeDelete = true)
Parameters
Type Name Description
PropertyInfo NavProp

The navigation property on the principal entity that exposes the related data.
Type DependentType

The CLR type of the dependent entity.
Column PrincipalKey

The key column on the principal entity used as the relationship principal.
Column ForeignKey

The foreign key column on the dependent entity referencing the principal key.
bool CascadeDelete

Specifies whether deletes on the principal entity cascade to dependents.
